title: Zombie Apocalypse team!
body:
Make your own Zombie Apocalypse team! It can be from whatever you want!
Here are some examples:
League: http://i.imgur.com/Zzlj75j.jpg
Overwatch: http://i.imgur.com/9drFfIW.jpg
Or your favorites: http://i.imgur.com/RA8bK3P.jpg
Good luck creating your team!

replies.body:
Wow, your medic is Aqua.

There is just no hope in that future is there?
